s.text: Deputy Press Secretary Joe Lockhart, who will succeed McCurry as press secretary next month, remains behind.
Deputy Press Secretary Joe Lockhart, who will succeed McCurry as press secretary next month, remains behind.
Deputy Press Secretary Joe Lockhart, who will succeed McCurry as press secretary next month, remains behind.
The assembled reporters have to ask questions, but they know he can't answer them.
